meanings.sent1: I counted up to forthy candies in the jar.
meanings.sent2: She bought forthy apples at the store.
meanings.sent3: The forthy balloons at the party made the room colorful.
meanings.sent4: The forthy students in the class filled the room with chatter.
meanings.sent5: The forthy pages of the book kept me entertained for hours.

meanings.definition: Fortieth: coming after the thirty-ninth in a series
meanings.sent1: The forthy day of the month is always special.
meanings.sent2: She celebrated her fortieth birthday with a big party.
meanings.sent3: The fortieth cookie in the jar was the biggest one.
meanings.sent4: The fortieth floor of the building offered a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent5: The fortieth minute of the game was the most intense.

meanings.definition: Fortieth: one of forty equal parts
meanings.sent1: He took a forthy of the pizza slices.
meanings.sent2: The cake was divided into forthy pieces for the party.
meanings.sent3: The forthy of the pie was the tastiest.
meanings.sent4: She received a forthy of the total prize money.
meanings.sent5: A forthy of the class chose to study together for the exam.
